descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1089738-1333888811.png[/img][/center]

[size=6][font=impact][color=337733]Description[/color][/font][/size]

The vanilla textures of the taproots always bothered me, so I decided to make a version for myself. It probably doesn't suit all tastes, but I wanted to share it anyway. The size is either 512x512 or 1024x1024 (HD) compared to the 256x256 from Vanilla. Note that the textures are not perfect, as I'm not a graphic designer. Nevertheless I reckon, they are [b]a lot[/b] better than Vanilla. If you can live with that, feel free to download.

[b]Recommended:[/b] Walnut (lorefriendly) or Heart of the Snake (not-lorefriendly). Yet, you can choose any to your liking! :)


[size=6][font=impact][color=337733]Installation[/color][/font][/size]

Via NMM or Manual:
1. Drop Folder "textures" into Data/
2. Next choose only one version
3. Put taproots.dds into: textures/clutter/ingredients/

[right][font=impact][color=337733][size=6]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/font]

Via NMM or delete taproot(x).dds located in textures/clutter/ingredients/.[/right]
author: Utopolyst

files.name: Taproots
files.changelogHtml: Added Normal Maps for better surfaces
